trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Contiene dati associati alla chiusura di un’istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata, viene generata una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> dall'infrastruttura di controllo della fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Terminated><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associato a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro include un elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configurato per un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Terminated><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, l'infrastruttura di controllo del flusso di lavoro inserisce la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> nella proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> dell'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> che invia al servizio di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza del flusso di lavoro può essere terminata in tre modi: l'host può chiamare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, un'attività <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> può essere richiamata dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro o è possibile che si verifichi un'eccezione non gestita.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated by the host or a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Se l’istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata dall’host o da un’attività <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, l’infrastruttura di controllo della fase di esecuzione imposta <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> su <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> la cui proprietà <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> è impostata su una descrizione del motivo della chiusura.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se il flusso di lavoro viene terminato a causa di un'eccezione non gestita, l’infrastruttura di controllo della fase di esecuzione passa l’eccezione non gestita a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> viene utilizzata solo dal servizio di rilevamento di runtime per passare informazioni in un elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: I dati relativi a un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=nameWithType> vengono passati in un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato un metodo, denominato `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, che acquisisce un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code checks whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Il codice controlla se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> è `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to the console.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il codice scrive il messaggio associato alla proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> nella console.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> è `null` (`Nothing`), il codice non scrive nessuna informazione sull'eccezione nella console.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice è parte dell'esempio SDK EventArgs Tracking nel file Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [esempio EventArgs Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'eccezione che ha causato la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> che ha causato la chiusura dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata a causa di un'eccezione non gestita, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contiene l'eccezione non gestita.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata da una chiamata dell'host a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o da un'attività <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contiene una <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> in cui la proprietà <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> è impostata su una descrizione del motivo della chiusura.

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; if the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se l’host termina l'istanza del flusso di lavoro, fornisce questa descrizione nel parametro `string` a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; se l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene terminata da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, la descrizione è fornita da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato un metodo, denominato `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, che acquisisce un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code checks whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Il codice controlla se la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> è `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to the console.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il codice scrive il messaggio associato alla proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> nella console.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> è `null` (`Nothing`), il codice non scrive nessuna informazione sull'eccezione nella console.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice è parte dell'esempio SDK EventArgs Tracking nel file Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [esempio EventArgs Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
